title: LAKE HOUSE (Arvada/Denver/Westminster)
posting_body: ['LAKE HOUSE (Arvada/Denver/Westminster)', '$1,950 / 2br - Nice House on Lake (Arvada/Denver/Westminster)', '2BR and 1Bath, looking for active professional(s) or college student(s), non-smoking, no dogs or cats allowed.', 'Minimum one-year lease, would make a great corporate suite!', 'Available Janu 1st, 2021.', 'Large two bedroom/one bath all-inclusive walkout available (1375sf apartment); it is the lower half of a large newer lakefront house (total 3250sf).', 'House located on a lake built for water-skiing, in a GATED LAKE COMMUNITY, close to Regis University, Metro (MSU), CU Denver (UCD), Colorado School of Mines.', 'Fish, kayak, canoe, or swim.', 'This is a laid-back, active yet private water-ski community--it is also a fun, relaxing place to live.', 'It is centrally located between DIA and the mountains, near Arvada: 10 minutes to downtown Denver or Golden and 20 minutes to Boulder; and within five minutes of I-70, I-76, I-25, or I-36.', 'Great place for active professionals or college students.', 'The house has many amenities including:', '-separate/private entrances', '-large kitchen (the house has two kitchens)', '-extra large front/great room with windows facing lake', '-large bedrooms with large mirrored closets', '-storage rooms', '-air conditioning', '-washer/dryer available', '-cable and internet', '-off-street parking next to house for two cars (no garage space available)', '-lots of guest parking on street', '-large patio and deck (facing the lake with the beach 20 yards from patio) great for BBQs', '-bring your own kayak, canoe or paddle board to the BEACH FRONT property', '-lots of hiking trails for running or biking, in and out of gated community', '2BR and 1Bath for $1,750 per month + utilities.', '$2,500 Deposit, background check required, must be employed with references and a non-smoker, and absolutely NO pets.', 'Please email your phone number and information, or call / text to', 'show contact info', 'or call / text to 303 and 521 and 1049 (leave voice message or text with a good time to call you back).']
